titleInfo.title: John Wesley Ryles and Stan Hitchcock Postcard

mods.abstract: Black and white negatives taped to and framed by a masking sheet advertising John Wesley Ryles, I, and his song "Reconsider Me," and Stan Hitchcock and his song "The Light of Love." The negatives feature photographs of John Wesley Ryles, I, and Stan Hitchcock. The bottom portion of the negatives contains Top Billing, Inc.'s address and an outline for a stamp and address. The negative would have been used to create a corresponding printing plate.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
